T02D3030:73a-0: @73a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3030:73a-1: nor 'grib par 'gyur ba slar 'gugs par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D3030:73a-2: shin tu ma phongs pa'i khyim nas blangs la zhing
T02D3030:73a-3: bzang po'i sa dang bsres la stegs bu bya ste
T02D3030:73a-4: / thig btab la da nas tshon dgye ba ni /
T02D3030:73a-5: dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po khyams gnyis dang sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya'o //
T02D3030:73a-6: lte bar rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i mtshan ma gdab bo //
T02D3030:73a-7: shar du rigs ldan bum pa /
T02D3030:73a-8: lhor stobs bzangs kyi be con dang /
T02D3030:73a-9: nub tu mtshon chen gyi bse kha sbyor /
T02D3030:73a-10: byang du rnam thos sras kyi dong tse bris la /
T02D3030:73a-17: seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi sgo bzhir btsugs la me tog gi phreng bas sbrel lo //
T02D3030:73a-18: mtha' mar rin po che sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D3030:73a-19: 'bru sna tshogs pa'i tshom bu dgod /
T02D3030:73a-20: de'i phyi rim du shing me tog dang lo ma
T02D3030:73a-21: dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa sna tshogs pa btsugs
T02D3030:73a-22: te / dkyil 'khor mi mthong bar bya'o //
T02D3030:73a-23: de'i phyi rim rnams su dri sna tshogs pa'i chag chag gdab ste /
T02D3030:73b-0: rtsva ku shas 'khor bar @73b dgram mo //
T02D3030:73b-1: steng du dar sna tshogs pa'i yol ba dang /
T02D3030:73b-2: 'phyang ma 'phyang gis khebs par byas so //
T02D3030:73b-3: logs rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ris su bris pa dang /
T02D3030:73b-4: 'bur du btod pa dang lugs su blugs pa la sogs pa 'khor bar dgram mo //
T02D3030:73b-8: bldag pa la sogs pa kha zas kyi bye brag
T02D3030:73b-9: ji ltar 'byor pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'
T02D3030:73b-10: mar bzhag la / mchod g-yog pa gnyis sam gsum gyis mchod pa rgyun ma chad par bya'o //
T02D3030:73b-11: slob dpon bdag stod g-yogs la sogs pa'i rgyan dang /
T02D3030:73b-12: dbu rgyan la sogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3030:73b-13: rdo rje dang dril bu bzung la ku sha'i steng du khrus bya /
T02D3030:73b-14: rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan la 'khor dang bcas te gzhag go //
T02D3030:73b-15: de'i phyi logs la g-yas brkyang ba'i stabs kyis g-yas skor du h'um zhes bgegs bskrad /
T02D3030:73b-17: byang shar nas g-yon brkyang ba'i stabs kyis g-yon skor
T02D3030:73b-18: du aom badzra yaksha h'um h'um zhes brjod pas bdag
T02D3030:73b-19: dang yon bdag gi nor 'grib par byed pa'i bgegs
T02D3030:73b-20: de dpag tshad brjod kyis mi lang bar byer zhing
T02D3030:73b-21: dengs par bya'o // de nas mchod pa dang gtor
T02D3030:73b-22: ma'i cho ga zhag gsum du rgyun ma chad par
T02D3030:73b-23: dengs par bya'o // bya / bdag nyid kyi snying
T02D3030:73b-24: po rgyas bsdus gang mos la ci nus su bzlas
T02D3030:73b-25: dengs par bya'o // bya / / yon bdag gis sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D3030:73b-27: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3030:73b-28: 'dod pa'i don la sogs pa la gsol ba ci nus su byed du gzhug go //
T02D3030:73b-29: de nas nub gsum gyi tha ma kha zas longs spyod pa dang ;
T02D3030:73b-30: yon bdag bza' bran 'khor dang bcas pa la dkyil
T02D3030:73b-31: 'khor gyi sgo rnams gsal la dkyil 'khor du gzhug
T02D3030:73b-33: rnam thos sras la gtor ma chen po gcig byin la nor gyi bdag por mnga' gsol /
T02D3030:73b-34: yon bdag 'khor dang bcas pas kyang /
T02D3030:73b-35: byang phyogs kyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras
T02D3030:73b-36: kyi bu 'khor dang bcas pas do nub nas bzung
T02D3030:73b-37: ba phan chod nor gyi bdag po mdzod la bdag
T02D3030:73b-38: cag gi nor dang zas mi 'grib par 'phel bar
T02D3030:73b-39: mdzad du gsol zhes dus la brjod do //
T02D3030:74a-0: sil snyan sna tshogs pa'i sgra dang ldan pas @74a * //
T02D3030:74a-4: bsod nams kyi tshogs ji ltar 'byor ba bsag cing bla ma la yon dbul lo //
T02D3030:74a-5: nor 'grib pa dgang ba'i cho ga dpag bsam shing rgyas pa zhes bya ba /
